name: Dragon Slayer Quest
description:
You are a knight trying to slay dragons to save the princess. Dragon Slayer Quest is an addicting action packed game of might and magic. Slash the flying dragons to save the princess as you try and get high score. Try and slice as many dragons as possible without hitting a flying princess. During the battle when you see a spell scroll you touch it to cast the spell.

+ Slash 5 different dragons
+ Slashing and spell attacks
+ Lightning Bolt scroll kills all dragons on the screen
+ Freeze scroll freezes all dragons on the screen
+ Hourglass scroll slows down the generation of dragons and princesses
+ Easy to play hard to master
